sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>ast_contract</collection> <condition>!current.isInManageLifecycle && (current.starts.changes() || current.ends.changes() || current.terms_and_conditions.changes())</condition> <description>Append new history record to contract history table upon change.</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>ContractHistory</name> <order>115</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var cmu = new ContractManagementUtils(); if (!gs.nil(current.oldStartDate) || !gs.nil(current.oldEndDate)) { cmu.appendContractHistory(previous, current.oldStartDate, current.oldEndDate); } else if (!previous.starts.nil() || !previous.ends.nil() || !previous.terms_and_conditions.nil()) { cmu.appendContractHistory(previous); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-10-31 19:27:44</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>041a9d239711300000f8d7b8fa2975bb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ContractHistory</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Contract Management" source="com.snc.contract_management">53e738ac3cb1311068bcf327dfe37ff3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_041a9d239711300000f8d7b8fa2975bb</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-01-26 05:24:00</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=041a9d239711300000f8d7b8fa2975bb"/> </record_update>
